channel.title: Project Calorie Fountain (Plans)
channel.description: Show me how to build a calorie fountain

item.title: Welcome to the Plans Page
item.dc:creator: Jefferson Smith
item.description:
Yes, you're in the right place. Unfortunately, the project is just getting started so I don't have any plans to share yet.

I expect to get things started this week with a (slightly) interactive table of all the crops I've studied, but for now, you'll have to wait.

If you know about RSS feeds, you can use the feed link for this page to subscribe and get an alert when anything new gets posted here.
